Action.author: harrisob@us.ibm.com
Action.body: Users have noted that with 1.4 they are setting the request timeout long enough to handle this issue. We should wait until a customer has an issue before putting in a change to 1.4.

Action.author: bestbeforetoday
Action.body: To avoid the call to *Network.addBlockListener()* blocking while the fabric-common implementation waits for a block to be received (or a timeout waiting for that block), I may change the fabric-network code to request a start block one earlier than the one the user wants (which should exist and be delivered immediately) and then filter out the spurious block in the fabric-network code.
